Module pipeline
Package tcpassos.pipeline

Interface OptionalPipeline<BEGIN,END>

Type Parameters:
BEGIN - Pipeline input element type
END - Pipeline output element type
All Superinterfaces:
BasePipeline<BEGIN,Optional<END>>
All Known Subinterfaces:
Pipeline<BEGIN,END>, UnaryPipeline<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AtomicPipeline, AtomicUnaryPipeline
public interface OptionalPipeline<BEGIN,END> extends BasePipeline<BEGIN,Optional<END>>
Processing pipeline using generics that returns an Optional with the output element or a Optional.empty() if the pipeline is interrupted before reaching the end.
